p: All model assumptions were checked adopting the graphical validation procedures recommended by Zuur et al. [ 62]. Model comparison was based on likelihood ratio test with χ 2 distribution and multiple pairwise comparisons on least-squares means with Tukey’s adjustment of the P value. Statistical analyses were performed in R 3.2.5 [ 63] using the packages glmmADMB [ 64, 65], MuMIn [ 61], lsmeans [ 66] and ade4 [ 60].
